com.example.yanghanwen.taskmanagementmonster

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.yanghanwen.taskmanagementmonster.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Object class of task Contain the information and operation method of the current task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task()
      Create an empty task object.
      Task(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String taskname, java.lang.String description)
      Create a task object by using the input

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createNewBid(java.lang.String bidder, java.lang.Double amount)
      Create a new bid object and add it into the bid list of this task If current status is requested, then change the status to bidded as there are a bid on this task.
      void declineBid(java.lang.String bidder)
      Decline a user's bid on this task If after decline there are no bid on this task, reset the status to requested.
      void emptyBids()
      Delete all bids on this task and reset the status to requested
      Bid getBid(int position)
      Return a bid in the specified position in the bids list
      java.util.ArrayList<Bid> getBidList()
      Return an ArrayList of bids for function that list all bids of this task in the listview.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Return description
      java.lang.Double getLowestBid()
      Get the lowest bid amount in all bids of this task
      java.lang.String getStatus()
      Return the status
      java.lang.String getTaskname()
      Return the taskname
      java.lang.Double getUserAmount(java.lang.String bidder)
      By using a input username, get the user's bid amount on this task.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Return the username
      java.lang.Boolean hasBid()
      Judge this task has at least one bid, and return a boolean True is it has at least one bid, else return false
      void modifyBid(java.lang.String bidder, java.lang.Double newAmount)
      Change the one of user's bid amount on this task
      void setAssigned(java.lang.String username)
      Assigned the task to a user All the other bids on this task will be deleted, only the assigned user's bid will remain in the bids list.
      void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Change description of this task
      void setDone()
      Set the task to done status.
      void setStatus(java.lang.String status)
      Change current status to the new value
      void setTaskname(java.lang.String taskname)
      Change current taskname to the new value
      java.lang.String toString()
      return a string summarize the general information of the task

      • createNewBid

        public void createNewBid(java.lang.String bidder,
                         java.lang.Double amount)
        Create a new bid object and add it into the bid list of this task If current status is requested, then change the status to bidded as there are a bid on this task.
        Parameters:
        bidder - username of user that bid this task
        amount - amount of bid that user want to bid

      • hasBid

        public java.lang.Boolean hasBid()
        Judge this task has at least one bid, and return a boolean True is it has at least one bid, else return false
        Returns:

      • getBidList

        Return an ArrayList of bids for function that list all bids of this task in the listview.
        Returns:
        The bids list of this task

      • getUserAmount

        public java.lang.Double getUserAmount(java.lang.String bidder)
        By using a input username, get the user's bid amount on this task. If the user haven't bid on this task, then return null.
        Parameters:
        bidder - a user's username
        Returns:
        the Double value of user's bid on this task

      • getLowestBid

        public java.lang.Double getLowestBid()
        Get the lowest bid amount in all bids of this task

        public void modifyBid(java.lang.String bidder,
                      java.lang.Double newAmount)
        Change the one of user's bid amount on this task
        Parameters:
        bidder - the username of modified bid's user
        newAmount - the new bid amount of the user's bid

      • declineBid

        public void declineBid(java.lang.String bidder)
        Decline a user's bid on this task If after decline there are no bid on this task, reset the status to requested.
        Parameters:
        bidder - the username of the declined task's user

      • emptyBids

      • setAssigned

        public void setAssigned(java.lang.String username)
        Assigned the task to a user All the other bids on this task will be deleted, only the assigned user's bid will remain in the bids list.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of assigned user
